class.name: CanvasLayer
class.description: Canvas drawing layer. [CanvasItem] nodes that are direct or indirect children of a [code]CanvasLayer[/code] will be drawn in that layer. The layer is a numeric index that defines the draw order. The default 2D scene renders with index 0, so a [code]CanvasLayer[/code] with index -1 will be drawn below, and one with index 1 will be drawn above. This is very useful for HUDs (in layer 1+ or above), or backgrounds (in layer -1 or below).

method.name: get_custom_viewport
method.description: Returns the [Viewport] used by the camera if it is not using the default viewport.

method.name: get_rotation
method.description: Return the base rotation for this layer in radians (helper).

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Return the base transform for this layer.

method.name: get_world_2d
method.description: Return the [World2D] used by this layer.

method.name: set_custom_viewport
method.description: Assigns a custom [Viewport] node to the [code]CanvasLayer[/code]. If [code]viewport[/code] is not a [Viewport], it re-assigns the default viewport instead.

method.name: set_rotation
method.description: Set the base rotation for this layer in radians (helper).

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Set the base transform for this layer.

members.member: Layer index for draw order. Lower values are drawn first. Default value: [code]1[/code].
